metadata.title: CVE-2015-4556 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The string-translate* procedure in the data-structures unit in CHICKENbefore 4.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4556` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chicken-bin - 4.12.0-0.3
libchicken11 - 4.12.0-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chicken package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.12.0-0.3').
